00042     return *this;

00045   //------------------------------------------------ EulerAngle::FromMatrix
00046   const EulerAngle& EulerAngle::FromMatrix( const Matrix& m )
00047   {
00048     // http://vered.rose.utoronto.ca/people/david_dir/GEMS/GEMS.html
00049     // assuming that angle is in static XYZ order
00050     chain::Real cy = CH_SQRT(m.m00*m.m00 + m.m10*m.m10);
00051     if (cy > 16*0.00001) {
00052       x = CH_ATAN2(m.m21, m.m22);
00053       y = CH_ATAN2(-m.m20, cy);
00054       z = CH_ATAN2(m.m10, m.m00);
00055     } else {
00056       x = CH_ATAN2(-m.m12, m.m11);
00057       y = CH_ATAN2(-m.m20, cy);
00058       z = 0;
00059     }
00060     return *this;
00061   }
00062 
00063   //------------------------------------------------ EulerAngle::FromQuat
00064   const EulerAngle& EulerAngle::FromQuat( const Quaternion& q )
00065   {
00066     return FromMatrix(q.ToMatrix());
00067   }
00068 
00069   //------------------------------------------------ EulerAngle::ToQuat
00070   chain::Quaternion EulerAngle::ToQuat()
00071   {
00072     // http://vered.rose.utoronto.ca/people/david_dir/GEMS/GEMS.html
00073     // assuming that angle is in static XYZ order
00074     Quaternion q;
00075     Real ti, tj, th, ci, cj, ch, si, sj, sh, cc, cs, sc, ss;
00076 
00077     ti = x*0.5; tj = y*0.5; th = z*0.5;
00078 
00079     ci = CH_COS(ti);  cj = CH_COS(tj);  ch = CH_COS(th);
00080     si = CH_SIN(ti);  sj = CH_SIN(tj);  sh = CH_SIN(th);
00081 
00082     cc = ci*ch; cs = ci*sh; sc = si*ch; ss = si*sh;
00083 
00084     q.x = cj*sc - sj*cs;
00085     q.y = cj*ss + sj*cc;
00086     q.z = cj*cs - sj*sc;
00087     q.w = cj*cc + sj*ss;
00088 
00089     return q;
00090   }
00091 }
